transcript.text:
￼


























Reviews
Setup Reviews.io

5 min
overview & purpose get genuine reviews from your customers by integrating review\ io into your onprintshop website by displaying genuine reviews most of our clients see an uplift in conversion within a few weeks review\ io has several other features such as sms collection, video reviews, social proof & influencer none of them cost our clients a penny extra some great features of review\ io that you can enjoy on your onprintshop website – review\ io is a google review partner this will help your business earn google review stars you can also showcase your reviews on the product pages thus adding an authentic edge to your products review\ io makes it easy for your customers to leave a video review they can respond to an email or sms invitation, create their video and share it, all without leaving their smartphone with review\ io social proof tools your customers can attach photos or create video reviews to give you instant, impactful content for instagram, google display ads, facebook and other marketing channels with in mail review collection templates you can collect reviews directly from the email collect and publish reviews in a matter of seconds how to integrate read below a systematic guide to integrate review\ io on your onprintshop website 1 sign up/login into review\ io 1 sign up/login into review\ io visit the review\ io website https //www reviews io/business solutions and login if you already have created the account or start your free trial choosing the suitable plan fill up the above form to start your free trial 2 get the api key and email setting 2 get the api key and email setting after your account gets activated, go to https //dash reviews io/integration/api https //dash reviews io/integration/api here you’ll find the review\ io store id and api key on the account integration page to update the product review invitation email template, which matches your brand’s look & feel go to https //dash reviews io/#/templates https //dash reviews io/#/templates you can view and keep track of your review invitation history of sent emails from https //dash reviews io/history/index https //dash reviews io/history/index 3 integration in to admin panel 3 integration in to admin panel for the integration, go to admin panel >> store configuration >> external service settings >> reviews >> review\ io >> enable note there are two other reviewing systems apart from stamped io, so only one review api can be enabled at a time after enabling the toggle against the review\ io, click on the edit icon enter the api private and store id gathered in the previous step select the location to add the review page you can also choose to send an auto generated email to your customers after they complete their purchase enable the show product ratings besides pthe roduct page heading setting to display the product ratings beside the product page heading save the changes
Did this page help you?
